attributes.action: Stop using hotels for illegal immigrants.
attributes.additional_details: People in the UK are struggling to pay for their own housing, utilities and food. Yet we are expected to pay for people who have broken the law by entering the UK illegally, to stay in better conditions than we are.
attributes.background: Stop using tax payers money to pay for hotels to temporarily or permanently house people who have entered the country illegally.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petition, which calls for similar action:

Shut the migrant hotels down now and deport illegal migrants housed there
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/718406
